creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Panel of faded brick-red k'ossu with large, four-clawed dragon in gold. Watery clouds at top; loose clouds in field; waves of the Eternal Sea at bottom. Border of floral brocade on mauve ground. K'ossu badly worn. Lining of faded salmon silk.
title: Panel
